tasks.task: Loading and setting up a drill for reseeding a grass hay pasture.

Mixed oats, grass pasture seed, fescue, timothy, and leftover wheat seed.

Arranging to sell the leftover wheat at half price to a neighbor.
Preparing to plant corn in about two weeks.

Attaching a trailer to a tractor.
Checking stored seeds and supplies.
Mixing and preparing seeds for reseeding.
Adjusting drilling equipment (gauge wheels, disc openers).
